description: Chrysler and Ford are reporting strong sales numbers, particularly truck sales, for June. Though manufacturing data across several other industries is down.
title: When a deflating economy may not be all that bad
contentencoded:
Chrysler and Ford are reporting strong sales numbers, particularly truck sales, for June. Though manufacturing data across several other industries is down.

Juli Neimann, analyst at Smith Moore & Company, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio with the details.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, July 2, 2013
teaser: Chrysler and Ford are reporting strong sales numbers, particularly truck sales, for June. Though manufacturing data across several other industries is down.
